appetizers.name: Tuna Tartare Tidbits
appetizers.description: Freshly caught tuna served with a delicate seaweed salad.

appetizers.name: Salmon Sushi Surprise
appetizers.description: Handcrafted sushi rolls filled with premium salmon and a hint of catnip.

appetizers.name: Crispy Catfish Croquettes
appetizers.description: Crispy fried catfish bites served with a tangy tartar sauce.

main_courses.name: Meow-meow Mackerel Medley
main_courses.description: Grilled mackerel fillets seasoned with a secret blend of herbs and spices.

main_courses.name: Fancy Feast Flounder Florentine
main_courses.description: Tender flounder fillets topped with a creamy spinach and cheese sauce.

main_courses.name: Purrfectly Grilled Swordfish
main_courses.description: Juicy swordfish steaks grilled to perfection and served with a side of lemon-butter sauce.

desserts.name: Whisker-Lickin' Good Tuna Ice Cream
desserts.description: Creamy tuna-flavored ice cream topped with a sprinkle of catnip.

desserts.name: Fishy Delight Pudding
desserts.description: Rich and creamy pudding made with layers of vanilla custard and crushed fish-shaped cookies.

desserts.name: Salmon Surprise Cupcakes
desserts.description: Moist salmon-infused cupcakes topped with a decadent cream cheese frosting and a salmon jerky garnish.

beverages.name: Catnip-infused Lemonade
beverages.description: Refreshing lemonade infused with aromatic catnip.

beverages.name: Tuna Tango Smoothie
beverages.description: A blend of ripe bananas, strawberries, and tuna for a purrfectly balanced smoothie.

beverages.name: Feline Fizz Mocktail
beverages.description: A bubbly concoction of sparkling water and fish-flavored syrup, served with a fish-shaped ice cube.
